info.name: ECG App API (Full)
info.description: Postman collection covering all required ECG app APIs (technicians, doctors, duty management, patients, tasks).

response.name: list doctors tasks
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "tasks": [
        {
            "id": 3,
            "patient_id": 1,
            "technician_id": 11,
            "assigned_doctor_id": 14,
            "status": "assigned",
            "priority": "normal",
            "technician_notes": "Routine ECG",
            "assigned_at": "2025-11-12 12:26:53",
            "created_at": "2025-11-12 12:26:53",
            "comment": "Initial upload",
            "technician_name": "Tech One",
            "technician_email": "tech1@example.com",
            "doctor_name": "Dr. Example",
            "doctor_email": "dr1@example.com",
            "patient_name": "John Doe",
            "patient_id_str": "PAT20251112001",
            "patient_age": 45
        }
    ],
    "count": 1
}
